claim: Lionel Messi arrived in Kolkata on December 13, 2025, to kick off the GOAT India Tour 2025. Thousands gathered, chanting his name, waving Argentina flags, and climbing barricades.
text: Argentine football legend Lionel Messi's GOAT India Tour 2025 took a chaotic turn in Kolkata, with fans clashing amid poor crowd control, before he arrived in Hyderabad for an exhibition match. claim: For a seventh night in a row, there has been gunfire across the line of control. both sides accuse each other of opening fire in an unprovoked manner. Families are preparing for
text: Bears seek payback against Packers The Chicago Bears will try to get some payback when they meet the Green Bay Packers for the second time in three weeks in a matchup for the NFC North lead. The Packers will be without Micah Parsons after the star pass rusher suffered a season-ending knee injury in a loss at Denver last week. The Bears lost 28-21 at Green Bay two weeks ago, when Caleb Williams got intercepted in the end zone by Keisean Nixon with 22 seconds remaining. That knocked Chicago from first to seventh in the NFC and into second place in the division behind Green Bay. Chicago then pounded Cleveland and regained the North lead with the Packers falling at Denver. Parsons tore his ACL in that game.

text:
Football legend Lionel Messi's visit to Kolkata faced significant disruptions. Frustrated fans resorted to throwing bottles and attempting to breach gates at Salt Lake Stadium. The highly anticipated GOAT Tour was cut short due to the chaos. Many fans were unable to catch a glimpse of the star, leading to disappointment and security concerns. Angry fans threw bottles and chairs from the stands at Kolkata's Salt Lake Stadium. Police had to resort to lathicharge as fans protested outside the Hyatt Regency Hotel where Messi is staying.
